Description: 3 great size rooms. Eat-in-kitchen with garbage disposal, dishwasher, great cabinets and counters. Wall to wall thru out living room with wall AC and bedroom with large closet. Coin-op in the building plus storage bin in lower level. Owner requires good credit and references, Owner requires first and last month's rent plus a $200 security deposit, 1/2 month realtors processing fee. No Pets and No Smokers are allowed. Text Jeanne for an appointment
